title: Satan's Song: A Bailey Crane Mystery
description: Bailey Crane helps a mother find modest closure in the brutal beheading death of her daughter. Other murders in other states present a trail for our southern sleuth to follow, and he will find himself steeped in a case with bizarre far reaching psychological implications. The surprising ending comes on a stormy night in a Colorado mountain town and will mark a new beginning for the bible belt warrior of Cherokee blood. This Bailey Crane tale is not to be missed.
author: Billy Ray Chitwood
